name: Boring golf
description:
You are free to explore the golf course, drive a cart, play some golf, or walk through the trees. There are no points to be made, no highscore and no goals.

This was initially going to be a golf game, but as I didn't have enough time to finish it the way I want it I decided to release it now instead of leaving it unplayed on my hard drive. Hope it's fun for someone.

Credits:

Art and code by Luis Parravicini. You can follow me on twitter @luisparravicini

See AUDIO.txt inside the .zip for a list of all the fx and their respective credits.

Keyboard/Mouse controls

  • WASD to walk / drive
  • Mouse to control camera
  • E to use object
  • Esc for the main menu
  • C spawn a golf cart
  • Space to shoot (in golf mode)
  • Left click mouse and drag to aim shot (in golf mode)
  • Space to apply the brake on the cart (when driving)

You can enter golf mode by "using" the golf clubs. There is one at the beginning of each hole. When in golf mode, the angle for the shoot is controlled by WS.

Only tested with keyboard and mouse on macOS.
